changeSet.author: dvoet
changeSet.sql: insert into project_owner_groups_to_remove select g.name, g.email from WORKSPACE_ACCESS wa inner join `GROUP` g on wa.group_name = g.name inner join GROUP_SUBGROUPS sg on sg.parent_name = g.name where wa.access_level='PROJECT_OWNER' and wa.is_realm_acl = 0;

changeSet.author: dvoet
changeSet.sql: delete from WORKSPACE_ACCESS where group_name in (select x.name from project_owner_groups_to_remove x)

changeSet.author: dvoet
changeSet.sql: insert into WORKSPACE_ACCESS(workspace_id, group_name, access_level, is_realm_acl) select w.id, bpg.group_name, 'PROJECT_OWNER', 0 from WORKSPACE w, BILLING_PROJECT_GROUP bpg where w.namespace = bpg.project_name and project_role = 'Owner'

changeSet.author: dvoet
changeSet.sql: insert into WORKSPACE_ACCESS(workspace_id, group_name, access_level, is_realm_acl) select w.id, bpg.group_name, 'PROJECT_OWNER', 1 from WORKSPACE w, BILLING_PROJECT_GROUP bpg where w.namespace = bpg.project_name and project_role = 'Owner' and w.realm_group_name is null
